data.title: OK So You Have to Eat Somewhere
data.text: Overall experience was average.  The service was above average and the entree pricing exhibits good value.  This restaurant has clearly gone above and beyond to provide a tailgate party type atmosphere which is ok for some, but the food really was a let down.  It is more bar than restaurant and I guess the hope is that you drink enough to forget the food.  And don't ask for dessert.

data.title: Great staff, eh food
data.text: The atmosphere and set up is great, and the staff is very accommodating and always checks up on you. The food, unfortunately, is just average. For $10 a pop, maybe more than 5 literal fries could be added to the hamburger basket. The biscuits and gravy brunch plate was gross. The eggs were overcooked and scorched, and the sausage looked days old. Go for the atmosphere and grab a beer, but eat beforehand.

data.title: Great Atmosphere
data.text: This place offers excellent nightly specials. Their food is delicious and served up quickly. Their staff is wonderful.

data.title: Needs improvement
data.text: This restaurant has potential in their concept. It has both inside and outside seating which is sorely lacking in our area. In the winter they put up plastic for part of the outside area, but the smokers sit there which pushes the other people into the picnic area which has no lighting for the nighttime. You have to use your phone to see the menu. Also dogs are allowed anywhere outside & I'm not talking about service dogs. In the summer mister are used to keep you cool. The food is mediocre so it's really a place to drink.

data.title: A good place to grab a bite
data.text: This review will be for the one in Nederland.  Great out side sitting area and Tv's for the games that are on.  Great, friendly, fast service and lots of parking.  I would recommend to anyone who is in the area.  One side note, if you are sitting at the Bar and want to move to an outside table or inside, make sure your bill is closed before you leave.  We had a bit of a discrepancy about that.

data.title: Great place to relax
data.text: Laid back, relaxed and open area. Food is great, classic bar food menu. Crawfish when in season. Live entertainment at night. If you are a weary traveler on I-10, pull over and take a load off for a few.

data.title: Mr & Mrs
data.text: Excellent service and the food was great!  Nice outdoor atmosphere and live music to boot!! Prices are good for the local.

data.title: Hamburgers and Margaritas
data.text: We met a friend at Lukes for a late dinner and drinks. We sat inside and had a great time. The burgers were excellent and the house margaritas were very good. Our server, Hanna, was very attentive and put up with us better than she should have had to. We will be back!

data.title: Worst service ever
data.text: Nederland location- had the worst service ever. No waitress came to check on us, had to go to the bar and get our own drinks. Ordered burgers them came out wrong NEVER AGAIN!!!!!

data.title: Service was horrible
data.text: We waited an hour for food.  Asked about it three different times and not one waitress came back and gave any explanation other than kitchen staff had quit the night before, but the table that was seated after us got their food and we were STILL waiting.  Will never go back.

data.title: Service is way too slow.
data.text:
Our family group of 8  arrived at 5:40 on a Friday night.  We went right to an outdoor picnic table.  It took a little while to get our beverages and our meal orders were taken at 6:00 p.m.  We did not start getting our meals until 7:00 p.m. & it was 7:15 before everyone was served.  Yes, we were there over an hour waiting on our food.    

My burger was good and I enjoyed the jalapeno fries.      We live here locally. But will not be back.

data.title: Great food, great atnosphere
data.text: Great place to enjoy some drinks with friends! Burgers are delicious!! Will definitely be back. Covered and uncovered outdoor seating with heaters and live music! Had a blast catching up with old friends!!

data.title: Cool place for lunch
data.text: This place is very relaxed. People bring their dogs! Excellent hang out spot for friends on the weekend.

data.title: Good lunch spot
data.text: Glad to have it in the neighborhood.  Great service, quality food for a quick lunch or casual lunch meeting.

data.title: No Nachos
data.text: I ordered Chicken Nachos (Nederland Location): This meal was Disappointing 1 on a scale of 10; Unfortunately this was the WORSE nachos I've eaten, and I've eaten plenty. What I got was watered down cheese that turned the chips into wet noodles. I literally had to eat the nachos with a spoon because the meal became liquefied. I found one very small piece of chicken, and wasn't sure about the other little two giblets I found and swallowed. Can't say much for the lettuce that was supposed to be with the order. It was probably hidden under the slimy chips and (watered down) cheese. I did find the beans, they were on top of the mushy mess. I don’t see how anyone could screw up Nachos, but they figured how to do it.  Hey don’t believe me, try them yourself. Hopefully they won’t be such a disappointment. Bon Appetit.

data.title: Relaxed atmosphere and good food .
data.text: My co workers and I take a break after work to go here for drinks and good food. I love sitting outside on the patio They have great music and if its cold outside , nice warm heaters going.  Great place to relax and unwind. They alsp have a great lunch menu .

data.title: Nice spot to chill
data.text: Listen to Texas I have done in the best version you'll see. Large enough with the inside and outside seating. The smokers can sit outside at the picnic tables and us non smokers can fit into different inside building. food is good beer is cold prices are good. Even have a band every once in awhile

data.title: Trendy Place with cool Atmosphere
data.text: I loved this place. The reviews were mixed but I'm glad I came. It's hard to find a brunch place or anything opened on Sunday in this part of the country. The prices are affordable, food was fresh and tasty, and the environment is laid back and fun. I highly suggest this place and I will definitely be coming back.

data.title: Cold Beer
data.text: Just enlarged to meet the crowds need.  Good food and large selection of cold beer with homey atmosphere. Inside and outside seating.

data.title: Good food and drinks Great Fun
data.text:
I visit about once a week.  The staff is always friendly.  The food is good bar food.... Burgers, nachos, etc...   The fun happens on Tuesday nights when they hold a trivia contest.  The quiz masters are a ball of fun and energy.  The competition is a blast.  Very enjoyable place to visit.   

I am not a beer person... But my friends are and say the beer here is very good.

I highly recommend.  Not kid friendly at night of quiz!!!!
